title: BNY Mellon's Kumar on Financial Tech Trends, Products (Audio)
itunes:title: BNY Mellon's Kumar on Financial Tech Trends, Products (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Suresh Kumar, Senior Executive Vice President and Chief Information Officer at BNY Mellon, on technology trends and products, blockchain, and mobile trends.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
